name: Below the surface
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

Type the words as they appear in the screen.

BACKSPACE - clears the current word

NOTES:

The web version has some audio delay, if possible play the downloadable version.

CREDITS:

A Game by: Ernesto Torres
https://iamernesto.itch.io

SFX:

  • Bat sound (edited): https://freesound.org/people/Abacagi/sounds/483397/
  • Potion sound (edited): https://freesound.org/people/Jamius/sounds/41529/
  • clay jar break(edited): https://freesound.org/people/Clearwavsound/sounds/540336/

Assets:

  • Aleksandr Makarov (with some edits)
